text: Asɨ 3.1-2 Sng 110.1, Mt 6.33, Mk 12.36, 16.19, Ef 1.20, Fl 1.30, Kl 1.29, 2.12, 1 Te 2.2 agaŋ Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ dɨ abɨci cɨhu hɨhi iahami hameŋ ala naludɨ avi abɨci cɨhu hɨhi me iahahalaŋ uami. Hameŋ sadaŋ namɨlaŋ akuaba akuaba iahua Asɨ dɨ haiabɨla hɨniavɨlalɨ agɨlasaŋ igahɨlahɨla hɨnihalaŋ uami. Haiabɨla heŋ ala Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ agaŋ nudɨ mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ uvɨ Asɨ dɨ human sɨmi kɨlikɨli hɨnilalɨ heŋ mɨgahɨnidi uami. Akuaba akuaba fɨli hɨsɨŋ agɨlasaŋ igahɨlahɨla hɨnimɨlaŋ uami.
